Package edu.uci.isr.impromptu.pocketpc

Interface Summary
PeerQueryProtocol PeerQuery properties and commands used to compose the protocol PDUs, which are represented as YANCEES events by the application.
 

Class Summary
EventProcessor Receives events from the peers and process them.
EventViewer Visualizes the events being generated by the peers in the impromptu scenario.
PeerQueryServer Responds to events requesting a current snapshot of all the peers and their files.
TinyImpromptu This is the main applicatio class.
TinyImpromptuGUI This shell provides the GUI for the TinyImpromptu application
